title: chat ban
body: so i just got a 10 game chat ban for saying "no shit"...basically the only bad word in the whole game...while the people on my team litterally told my to killmyself and swore at me alot....ummm... riot??? can we review this pls? lmao

replies.body: i have my side of the chat saved, cause riot sent it to me...what i dont have is the side where the person says kys and tells me to fuck off and die...so umm...im fine with a 10 game chat ban, but what is he gonna get...i reported it...do something.

I can't help too much with why you were banned unless you post the full chat logs, but I suspect there's probably something that you haven't noticed in there. 

A good way to see if your behaviour wasn't great, is to think _"would I say these things directly to a stranger on the street?"_, if the answer is no chances are your chat logs weren't great.

Now, what your team mate said in that game is 100% unacceptable and against the rules. Sorry you had to play with someone like that :( 

If you're not happy with how the report system dealt with your report though, I recommend you submit a Riot Support Ticket [here](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).

The best category to use is:

**_"I want to report abusive behavior, cheating, or a malicious link"_**

i was probably a toxic asshole back then. chances are i still could be. but hey, im not a teenager and have a job so fuck it. it is what it is. id rather have a beer and hit the rift than waste peoples time trying to have shitty little arguments on the internet. probably just from years on playing xbox live back in the day

if that is all you got booted for, that sucks balls. 

suspect there may be more to the story though.

i wish i could get a chat ban instead of a 14 fucking day suspension. be so much better than a 14day ban rather go back to nah where u could say anything and it was 3 chat bans then 1 day ban instead of 14day ban and then probably perma.

Same. Instead of getting chat restricted, they suspended me instead. 
If I'd been chat restricted, I would've thought "oh yeah, I better reform". 
But now I'm thinking "what the fuck, Riot?"

I think they should have 1 chat ban allowance per month, then a 14 day ban, 28 day ban, a 3 month ban, then a permaban.
Upon unbanning there should be an instaban cooldown on the account, starting at the 14 day ban it should be 7 days, 14 days, 28 days then three months.

 There should also be more options to apply to be unbanned since the automated punishments could screw it up.

I feel like this would be literally perfect for league or any multiplayer game. It would keep the most toxic accounts out of action but still seem very kind.
